description: This file defines an Angular component 'ConfirmDialogComponent' that provides a confirmation dialog with configurable title, message, and button texts. It includes input properties for controlling its state and output events for confirmation and cancellation actions.

classes.name: ConfirmDialogComponent
classes.description: An Angular component that displays a confirmation dialog with customizable text and emits events upon user actions.

methods.name: onConfirm
methods.description: Emits the 'confirmed' event when the user confirms the dialog.

methods.name: onCancel
methods.description: Emits the 'cancelled' event when the user cancels the dialog.
